text: does anybody here have any experience with collaborative editing of Julia code (not interested in notebooks)? Any recommendations which tools to use? VS-code live share us pretty good.
Occasionally it bugs out, but mostly it just works.
It feels like good but still in beta.
I have used it regularly, though not for a month or so
